Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:settext('[arrow keys] to move, [enter] to set a binding, [delete] to remove a binding and [escape] to leave\ngameplay uses \'Left\', \'Right\', \'Up\' and \'Down\' bindings but not the Action related keys') end

Layer.SetCommand:
%function() --[[ queued because need to wait until it exists 12 to 38
there could be a better implementation for this but it is good enough ]] for i=12,38 do local row = SCREENMAN(i) local key = row(1) local sub = row(2) local P1K1 = row(3) local P1K2 = row(4) local P1K3 = row(5) local P1K4 = row(6) local P1k5 = row(7) local P2K1 = row(8) local P2K2 = row(9) local P2K3 = row(10) local P2K4 = row(11) local P2k5 = row(12) local spacing = 50 local margin = 30
row:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) key:x(0) key:zoom(0.65) sub:x(0) sub:zoom(0.45)
P1K1:x(spacing*-5-margin) P1K2:x(spacing*-4-margin) P1K3:x(spacing*-3-margin) P1K4:x(spacing*-2-margin) P1k5:x(spacing*-1-margin) P2K1:x(spacing*1+margin) P2K2:x(spacing*2+margin) P2K3:x(spacing*3+margin) P2K4:x(spacing*4+margin) P2k5:x(spacing*5+margin)
end
end
